org.molgenis.matrix.Matrix

Classes in org.molgenis.matrix that implement Matrix
 class CsvMatrix<E>
          Matrix that loads its data from a CsvReader.
 class MemoryMatrix<E>
          Simple 'in-memory' implementation of the Matrix.
 class ObservedValueMatrix
          Naive implementation of a datbase backed matrix that will base its view (order) on what features and targets there are set to be selected.
